About Me

Content

Bio

Graduate of Michigan State University. I love storytelling and the many aspects of it. I draw inspiration mainly from novels and live casters.

ACIV Webmaster

Web Developer

Built club awareness by creating a website to provide information to the public and allow for feedback. Ensured long term success by documenting and creating a web team to service to site and provide updates. Created a streamlined information flow by coding a service to allow leaders to make mass inquiries in the field, pull the requested data, and serve it live. Successfully created a web service to be used by the selective public.

Smart Hanger Project

Ux/Ui designer

Set the design direction to be as user friendly as possible through several user interviews, card sorts, rapid prototyping, and heuristic reviews. Created a product to allow people to explore clothing options through an integrated, designed experience, involving the hanger and the individuals smart phone. Demonstrated a working knowledge of rapid prototyping in Balsamiq.

TangentialDevelopment

Consultant

Coded a server to allow users to crawl twitter feeds. Served as team leader during HackIllinois creating a product that would calculate optimal routes to mow lawns. Created initial designs and managed members to convert into a minimum viable product.
